title: 4.08- The Tricolor Commission
itunes:title: 4.08- The Tricolor Commission
description: In February 1794, the National Convention not only ratified the emergency emancipation of the slaves, they extended it even further.
content:encoded: In February 1794, the National Convention not only ratified the emergency emancipation of the slaves, they extended it even further.
